oai_dc:dc.dc:title: HealthyGrowth - WP2: State of the art report Austria
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Furtschegger, Christoph
Schermer, Markus
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
Produce chain management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Within the HealthyGrowth Project the Austrian State of the Art Report contribution reviews the most current research of studies investigating mid-scale values-based food chains in Austria comprising studies of former projects like COFAMI (Collective Farmers Marketing Initiatives), EuroMARC or OMiARD (Organic Marketing Initiatives and Regional Development). Besides it includes also a description of theoretical and methodological approaches employed in the studies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Furtschegger, Christoph and Schermer, Markus (2013) HealthyGrowth - WP2: State of the art report Austria. , Innsbruck.
